channel.title: Black mesa soundtrack may release soon..
channel.description:
Well I'm a lurker for about 2 years, and probably posted this in the wrong place cause i hardly posted on here or don't know the website to well surprisingly, but I thought it would be cool to know about this update to the Joel Nielsen Black mesa soundtrack page. I know people may know about it and sorry if its old news. Remember that the page ISN'T public yet but the last 2 paragraphs in the page lead me to believe that the soundtrack might go up soon (hopefully).
Il quote "After seven years, hundreds of hours and too many song revisions to count, the Black Mesa Soundtrack is finally released"
but keep in mind that the page is NOT public witch means that we shouldn't even be worrying about it until the page is public. i acknowledge that the page isn't public yet in my defense..
I'l quote: "This page is not yet public. Therefore there are no active links for the music"
if everybody already seen it then my bad :slight_smile:
[url]https://www.joelnielsen.com/bms/[/url]

item.title: Black mesa soundtrack may release soon..
item.dc:creator: brokenfridgehinge
item.description:
Raminator:

The soundtrack will be released two weeks before the mod. Just because the soundtrack is finalised doesn’t mean it is going to be available for download yet, which is what I already said:You’re reading into it too much.

This shouldn’t be in the show off section either…

Read full topic
item.source: Black mesa soundtrack may release soon..

item.title: Black mesa soundtrack may release soon..
item.dc:creator: NomadHH
item.description:
brokenfridgehinge:

Have a read through this thread, it should answer most of your questions about the mod.

https://forums.blackmesasource.com/showthread.php?t=9883

oh yea i know about that one i was just suggesting that he was preparing his page for the release. thanks though I’l close the thread soon

Read full topic
